matching_services_instructions.message: The following search services have been defined for this page. You can edit an existing one or create a new one.

no_matching_services_instructions.message: There are no search services defined for this page. Please, create a new one.

name_the_service.message: Please, select a name matching the search engine you will wrapp

service_name_already_exists.message: This name is already taken by another service

select_the_input_control.message: Please, click on the element of the page that you identify as the input control of the search form.

trigger_mechanism_instructions.message: Select the mechanism that the page search engine uses to retrieve search results.

select_the_trigger_control.message: Click on the page element that you identify as the control that <b>triggers</> a search

click_on_control_to_trigger.message: Click on a control (button, anchor, etc.)

click_on_trigger_error.message: You did not select any element on the page as the search trigger of the engine.

default_missing_requirement.message: Sorry, there are some requirements that are not met in this form

results_selection_instructions.message: Please, click on the «container element» of each result returned by the search engine. Then, choose a name and the number of occurrences of the results.

results_tagging_instructions.message: Tag the result type you identify.

results_tag.message: Kind of results the engine retrieves

more_results_mechanism_instructions.message: Indicate how the results are retrieved on this page.

click_for_more_results_info.message: In this page, you have to click on an element like a button or an anchor for retrieving more results. E.g. a «Next page» button.

scroll_down_for_more_results_info.message: In this page, you have to scroll down in the page and it automatically loads more results (usually displaying a «loading» message while retrieving the results).

no_retrieval_strategy_info.message: Choosing this option will make it impossible to retrieve more results than the ones listed in the first page.

record_action_for_more_results_info.message: In this page, you have to interact with multiple elements in order to retrieve more results.

more_results_on_click_instructions.message: Please, click on the element of the page that you identify as the trigger for retrieving more results.

results_properties_instructions.message: Click on each of the properties you want your service to retrieve. Then, give them a name.

props_are_required.message: It is mandatory to define at least one property, since it is the information that will be retrieved when you use the service from the contextual menu.

select_a_sorter_control.message: Choose a mechanism to sort the results presented on the page.

no_sorters.message: By choosing this option, it will be impossible for the user to sort the results retrieved by the service.

click_to_sort_info.message: On this page it is necessary to click on an element (button, link, etc) to sort the results.

record_actions_to_sort_info.message: On this page it is necessary to carry out a series of actions (e.g. clicks, typing, etc.) on one or different elements to order the results.

select_a_filter_control.message: Choose a mechanism to filter the results presented on the page.

no_filters.message: By choosing this option, it will be impossible for the user to filter the results retrieved by the service.

click_to_filter_info.message: On this page it is necessary to click on an element (button, link, etc) to filter the results.

record_actions_to_filter_info.message: On this page it is necessary to carry out a series of actions (e.g. clicks, typing, etc.) on one or different elements to filter the results.

end_of_process_message.message:
Terminaste de crear el servicio.

Ahora lo podés utilizar subrayando contenido en cualquier página y realizando búsquedas mediante el menú contextual del navegador.

También podés editar este servicio abriendo este sidebar cuando estés navegando este mismo motor de búsqueda.
